issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Use new parquet arrow reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6700](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6700). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5378> is merged, DataFusion should be updated to use this new array reader support instead of the current parquet reader code in the DataFusion crate.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6700?focusedCommentId=16938198) by Renjie Liu (liurenjie1024):*
`[~andygrove]` Could you assign this ticket to me?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6700?focusedCommentId=16996470) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5641
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5641>
